product_description: A sustainable, insulated water bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. Made from recycled materials with a portion of proceeds supporting clean water initiatives.
target_audience: Environmentally-conscious consumers aged 25-45 who are interested in fitness, outdoor activities, and sustainable products.
brand_voice: Friendly, eco-conscious, and inspirational. We focus on the positive impact of sustainable choices.
key_selling_points: Eco-friendly materials, temperature retention, supports clean water initiatives, stylish design, multiple color options
